/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The color palette is dominated by shades of gray and green, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
